thread.title: What's the weather like for Chicago Cubs vs. Mets in NLCS Game 1?
thread.title_full: What's the weather like for Chicago Cubs vs. Mets in NLCS Game 1?

author: Ryan Hatch | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: What's the weather like for Chicago Cubs vs. Mets in NLCS Game 1?
text:
New York righty Matt Harvey will take on Chicago lefty Jon Lester . 
What's the weather going to be like in Queens? It should be a dry night if a little chilly. (Game time is 7:30 p.m.) 
Here's the weather forecast for this evening from Weather.com : 
— 7 p.m.: 50 degrees, zero chance of rain, northwest winds at 12 mph 
— 8 p.m.: 48 degrees, zero chance of rain, northwest winds at 11 mph 
— 9 p.m.: 46 degrees, zero chance of rain, northwest winds at 11 mph 
— 10 p.m.: 45 degrees, zero chance of rain, northwest winds at 10 mph 
Coming to Citi Field? Bring a sweater or two. Ryan Hatch may be reached at rhatch@njadvancemedia.com . Follow him on Twitter @ryanhatch . Find NJ.com on Facebook .
